alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 5:31AM CDT until April 11 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Eastern Jefferson County in east central Missouri... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 531 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hillsboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Festus, Crystal City and Horine around 540 AM CDT. Pevely, Herculaneum and Barnhart around 545 AM CDT. Valmeyer around 550 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Fountain, Waterloo and New Design. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 170 and 187. This also includes Mastodon Historic Site, Sandy Creek Covered Bridge Historic Site, and Gov. Dunklin`s Grave Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
